overview: Bonnie Dolce is fast asleep when her girlfriend, Tiffany Tatum, slips into the bedroom. Dropping a kiss on Bonnie's shoulder, Tiffany slips into the bathroom to wash off from her day… • Lacy Lennon's girlfriend, Aiden Ashley, has been deployed for a long time, but she's coming home today. Lacy is a bit nervous since it's been so long that she wonders if the spark will still be there between them… • It's been a bit since Jillian Janson and Madi Meadows have been able to get together. They finally get their schedules to match up for a visit… • Chloe Cherry and Harmony Rivers used to be such tight friends. Once upon a time, they would hang out and go clubbing together. Ever since Chloe started dating her boyfriend, though, things have changed…
title: I Kissed a Girl 2
